description.default: You are in a small, open-air theatre. A raised wooden stage stands at one end, surrounded by simple wooden benches. A flamboyantly dressed man, the Theatre Master, is directing a pair of unenthusiastic actors.

objects.all_quests_done_message: The Theatre Master is busy rehearsing.
objects.description: A man in a velvet coat and a feathered cap, waving his arms about dramatically.
objects.name: a theatre master
